column5: LAKE COVE-BEAUTIFUL CUSTOM WATERFRONT-PERFECT FOR ENTERTAINING-GREAT OPEN FLOOR PLAN WITH WINE ROOM & WET BAR OPEN TO FAMILY ROOM & GOURMET ISLAND KITCHEN-FORMAL DINING ROOM-FIRST FLOOR HANDICAP-ACCESSIBLE ENSUITE BEDROOM-LARGE MASTER W/FIREPLACE & WATER VIEWS-CUSTOM OUTDOOR KITCHEN-POOL AND BOAT HOUSE WITH REMOTE-CONTROLLED BOAT LIFT & MUCH MORE
